query: SELECT i FROM ints WHERE sqrt(i) % 1 = 0
SELECT i FROM ints WHERE sqrt(i) = floor(sqrt(i))
SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON B.i * B.i = A.i
SELECT i FROM ints WHERE i IN (SELECT i * i FROM ints WHERE i < 32 )
SELECT i FROM ints WHERE sqrt(i) % 1 != 0
SELECT i FROM ints A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ints B WHERE B.i < 45 AND A.i = B.i * (B.i + 1) / 2 )
SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON A.i = B.i * (B.i + 1) / 2 WHERE B.i < 45 ORDER BY A.i;
SELECT i FROM ints WHERE i IN (SELECT i * (i + 1) / 2 FROM ints WHERE i < 45 )
SELECT i FROM ints WHERE i = i * (i + 1) / 2
SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON A.i = B.i * (B.i + 1) WHERE B.i < 45 ORDER BY A.i;
SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON A.i = B.i * B.i / 2 WHERE B.i < 45 ORDER BY A.i
SELECT B.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON A.i = B.i * (B.i + 1) / 2 WHERE B.i < 45 ORDER BY A.i
SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON B.i < A.i AND A.i % B.i = 0 GROUP BY A.i HAVING A.i < sum(B.i) ORDER BY 1
formula: salt_023((0) + bit_xor(sum(nn(A.hash) + nn(B.hash))) OVER ()) AS token

query: SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON B.i < A.i AND B.i > 1 AND A.i % B.i = 0 GROUP BY A.i HAVING A.i < sum(B.i) ORDER BY 1
formula: salt_023((0) + bit_xor(sum(nn(A.hash) + nn(B.hash))) OVER ()) AS token

query: SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON B.i <= A.i AND A.i % B.i = 0 GROUP BY A.i HAVING A.i < sum(B.i) ORDER BY 1
formula: salt_023((0) + bit_xor(sum(nn(A.hash) + nn(B.hash))) OVER ()) AS token

query: SELECT A.i FROM ints A WHERE A.i < (SELECT sum(B.i) FROM ints B WHERE B.i < A.i AND A.i % B.i = 0 ) ORDER BY 1
WITH squares AS (SELECT DISTINCT B.i * B.i AS N2 FROM ints B WHERE B.i * B.i <= 1000 AND B.i > 1 ) SELECT A.i FROM ints A LEFT JOIN squares S ON A.i % S.n2 = 0 GROUP BY A.i HAVING count(S.n2) = 0
SELECT DISTINCT C.i FROM ints C JOIN ints A ON A.i * A.i <= C.i JOIN ints B ON A.i * A.i + B.i * B.i = C.i ORDER BY 1
formula: salt_032((0) + sum(nn(A.hash) + nn(B.hash) + nn(C.hash)) OVER ()) AS token

query: SELECT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON B.i * B.i <= A.i JOIN ints C ON C.i * C.i <= A.i WHERE B.i * B.i + C.i * C.i = A.i ORDER BY 1
formula: salt_032((0) + sum(nn(A.hash) + nn(B.hash) + nn(C.hash)) OVER ()) AS token

query: SELECT DISTINCT A.i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON B.i * B.i <= A.i JOIN ints C ON C.i * C.i <= A.i WHERE B.i * B.i + C.i * C.i = A.i
formula: salt_032((0) + sum(nn(A.hash) + nn(B.hash) + nn(C.hash)) OVER ()) AS token

query: SELECT DISTINCT A.i * A.i + B.i * B.i AS i FROM ints A JOIN ints B ON A.i * A.i + B.i * B.i <= 1000 AND A.i <= B.i ORDER BY 1
formula: salt_033((0) + sum(nn(A.hash) + nn(B.hash)) OVER ()) AS token

query: SELECT i FROM ints A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ints B WHERE B.i BETWEEN 2 AND A.i - 1 AND A.i % B.i = 0 ) AND i > 1
SELECT A.i FROM ints A WHERE A.i > 1 AND A.i NOT IN (SELECT A2.i FROM ints A2 JOIN ints B ON B.i BETWEEN 2 AND sqrt(A2.i) AND A2.i % B.i = 0)
SELECT A.i FROM ints A LEFT JOIN ints B ON B.i BETWEEN 2 AND sqrt(A.i) AND A.i % B.i = 0 WHERE A.i > 1 GROUP BY A.i HAVING count(B.i) = 0
SELECT A.i FROM ints A LEFT JOIN ints B ON B.i BETWEEN 2 AND sqrt(A.i) AND A.i % B.i = 0 GROUP BY A.i HAVING count(B.i) = 0
SELECT A.i FROM ints A LEFT JOIN ints B ON B.i BETWEEN 2 AND sqrt(A.i) AND A.i % B.i = 0 WHERE A.i != 0 GROUP BY A.i HAVING count(B.i) = 0
